FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a VLAN group.
The undo description command deletes the description of a VLAN group.
By default, no description is configured for a VLAN group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of a VLAN group.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you run the vlan-group command several times to configure multiple VLAN groups to deploy QoS policies for services or users or view QinQ packet statistics, run the description command to configure a description for each VLAN group. The description helps you learn about the functions of each VLAN group quickly, facilitating service management.
